question:
*OUR ASSIGNMENT*👇:
You are planning a short visit to a city where one of your relatives lives. 

Write a letter to your relative. In your letter:

1) Explain when and how long you will be in town. 

2) Ask whether you can stay at their home. 

3)Offer to pay for yourself.
text: How have you been? Hope you're not angry with me that I've not  called you in a while. My  work schedule has become so tight lately.

As a matter of fact, my boss nominated me for the two day workshop coming up in Kaduna State. It will commence this weekend. That means I will have to be there before the weekend so I don't miss any part of the program. I'm looking at coming over on a Thursday and going back on Saturday.

I was informed that the venue is very close to your residence. In view of that, I will like to stay at your place instead of a hotel because of the proximity. Additionally, it will be more convenient for me but subject to your approval.

I wish to assure you that you will not have to incur any expenses on my behalf. I will be responsible for my feeding and out of pocket expenses. Furthermore, you do not have to drive me to the place since we have an official bus for that purpose.

error_list.error_des: It appears that two day is missing a hyphen. Consider adding the hyphen(s).
